title: What is the purpose of technology? - Quora

response.answer_text: Technological development is very much important. It gives a new dimension to human life by providing a better and simple lifestyle to everyone. We are going to discuss importance of technological development in following two dimensional aspects - 1. Upcoming threats. 2. Preserving our history. Let's start with point one, we r all aware about some sort of immediate dangers like climate change, various virus outbreaks, cyber attacks & nuclear threat etc. Humanity could be saved by technological enhancement. For example, recently supercomputer of IBM named 'Summit' evaluated thousands of compounds and sorted out 77 effective drugs for tackle SARS-COV-2.Just imagine how much important technology is..!! Now second, our history is a series of events. It's quite impossible to keep written record of everything. Technology will keep everything safe, wheather on earth or beyond. It will give evidence of human existence. Hence in the development of mankind technological enhancement is inevitable.

(1) Thanks for the A2A. (2) Simply, Science reveals nature. For example, Newton discovered the Laws of Motion. (3) Simply, Technology applies the knowledge from Science into practical purposes. For example, Technology applies Newton’s Law of Motion into practical uses. Such application may or may not be commercialized. They may be championed by the government initially, and then eventually commercialized into broad application such as GPS navigation technology. (4) The most common purpose of Technology is to improve the lives of mankind. Most cases of this are straightforward. Some raise ethical dilemmas where there is a trade-off between advantages and disadvantages.
